name: Broken Cuckoo Clock
desc: Upon your next entry into the Simulated Universe, you will get a random 1-star Blessing.
bg_desc: A cuckoo clock craftsman from the Interastral Peace Corporation met "Terminus" once. The clock in her hand fell to the ground in her surprise, becoming shattered and broken in the Terminus's past. The craftsman later joined the Omen Vanguards, trying to use cuckoo clocks to interpret Terminus' prophecy. Although she went on to create countless clocks in her life, she always treasured this broken cuckoo clock. The moment it broke was when the craftsman met Terminus. The moment it broke was also when Terminus had yet to meet the craftsman.
